name: Dodge The Blocks (itch) (AutoLs)
description:
This is a simple 2D arcade-style game that I made for learning purpose. Any donation is appreciated <3 and it will give me extra motivation on updating the game :3

Gameplay: Avoid the blocks and survive as long as you can!

Current features:
- Customizable skins
- Unlimited gameplay and difficulty scaling

Additional info:
- This game is written with c/c++
- Library used: SDL and stb libraries
- Graphics API: OpenGL

Credits:
Music by Brandon Morris and FoxSynergy
SFX by Kenney, Roido
Art by  Kenney, Skorpio, Écrivain
Programming/Game design by me

FAQ
Q: Windows pops up a warning when I run the .exe file!
A: This is due to the fact that the executable is not certified yet. I will plan on doing that soon. If you don't trust me you can run a virus scan on the .exe file :D

Q: How do I create a new skin?
A: 1) Download the skin template and extract it to the skin folder, replace the stuff inside to your liking! Or 2) clone an existing skin folder and replace stuff inside. It is recommended that you download the skin template since it might get updated frequently.
